name: Oddworld: Smile Factory
description:
Oddworld: Smile Factory is a first-person horror fan game set in the universe created by Oddworld Inhabitants and it's founders Lorne Lanning and Sherry McKenna. Smile Factory intends to tell lore of Oddworld and let players experience it's sinister world in a way that hasn't been done before.

This has been made simply as an educational project to learn Unreal Engine with. Basically taking Oddworld and bits of Oddworld, the story of this epic franchise to make a fangame out of it that's hopefully completely different and a new kind of Oddworld experience.

Please do play Oddworld: Soulstorm and other actual Oddworld games before this to experience the Oddworld universe in it's true form.
